text: Scleromitrion verticillatum is a perennial plant that grows in Taiwan.The Hedyotis-Oldenlandia complex (Rubiaceae: Spermacoceae) in Asia and the Pacific: Phylogeny revisited with new generic delimitations Taxon 64(2) == Taxonomy == S.verticillatum (L.)
